marklogic.body: Heejun, Skylar and Hollie were the same bottom 3 in mj's voting performance poll, so maybe mj's blog represents what America is thinking! Heejun may be voted , but I bet he's not going home! I bet Idol will hire him to do something on the current season after he gets back from his media blitz!This week is the very first time that Jimmy's criticism was constructive (not mean spririted) and Spot on for everyone! Stevie brought out the best in Jimmy too!Totally loved how surprised (freaked out) DeAndre was when Eric Benet showed up! That was a great reality live moment!Love seeing behind the scenes in the mansion! How did DeAndre get the master bedroom? Did they pick straws or something? Now the rest of the Idols will want Dre to be voted Off, so they can have his bedroom! lol
